Event.name: Want_suspect
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Suspect</fen> has been investigated and has a warrant issued for his or her arrest on certain <fen>Charges</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Suspect">Bill</fex> <m>is</m> <t>wanted</t> <fex name="Charges">on murder charges</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Suspect
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Suspect</fen> is suspected of having committed a crime by the authorities who want the <fen>Suspect</fen> to enter the criminal process.</def-root>

Arg.name: Charges
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Charges</fen> are the offenses the <fen>Suspect</fen> will be accused of committing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: wanted.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: hunted or seeked by the police for a crime.
